DOC.brief_summary: Pancreatic exocrine insufficiency is known to impair nutrient absorption, especially fat, but few data exist about protein absorption. We aimed to investigate this question and assess the enzyme substitution efficiency using a sensitive method.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Enzyme Therapy on Protein Metabolism in Chronic Pancreatitis
